items.sentence: Are you sure you don\'t want to live at home with your parents?
Something you might want to consider buying is a new briefcase.
Tell Tom that he can get in touch with me at home this evening.
Tom knew how to do that already, so I didn\'t have to show him.
Tom learned later that Mary wasn\'t planning to live in Boston.
Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
It doesn\'t make any difference to me whether Tom comes or not.
We went to Tom\'s house to talk to him, but he wasn\'t at home.
Didn\'t you know that Tom lived in Australia when he was a kid?
Why did you tear the cloth instead of cutting it with scissors?
